event.title: CMN-600 Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F Cache Miss
event.description: Counts the total cache misses. This is the first time lookup result, and is high priority.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SLC SF Cache Access
event.description: Counts the number of cache accesses. This is the first time access, and is high priority.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F Cache Fill
event.description: Counts the total allocations in the HN SLC (all cache line allocations to the SLC).

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ Retry
event.description: Counts the number of requests that have been retried.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ Reqs Recvd
event.description: Counts the number of requests received by HN.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SF Hit
event.description: Counts the number of snoop filter hits.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SF Evictions
event.description: Counts the number of snoop filter evictions cache invalidations are initiated.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F Snoops Sent
event.description: Counts the number of snoops sent (not including SF invalidation).

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F Snoops Broadcast
event.description: Counts the number of multicast snoops sent (not including SF back invalidation).

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SLC Eviction
event.description: Counts the number of SLC evictions (dirty only).

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SLC Fill Invalid Way
event.description: Counts the number of SLC fills to an invalid way.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F MC Retries
event.description: Counts the number of transactions retried by the memory controller.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F MC Reqs
event.description: Counts the number of requests to the memory controller.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F QOS HH Retry
event.description: Counts the number of times a highest-priority QoS class was retried at the HN-F.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ OCCUPANCY_EVENT_ALL
event.description: Counts all POCQ occupancy requests in HN-F.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ_OCCUPANCY_EVENT_READ
event.description: Counts read POCQ occupancy requests in HN-F.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ_OCCUPANCY_EVENT_WRITE
event.description: Counts write POCQ occupancy in HN-F.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ_OCCUPANCY_EVENT_ATOMIC
event.description: Counts atomic operation POCQ occupancy requests in HN-F.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ_OCCUPANCY_EVENT_ATOMIC
event.description: Counts stash operation POCQ occupancy requests in HN-F.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ_ADDRHAZ_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of Point of Coherency Queue address hazards upon allocation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F POCQ_ATOMICS_ADDRHAZ_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of POCQ address hazards upon allocation for atomic operations

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F LD_ST_SWP_ADQ_FULL_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times ADQ is full for Ld/St/SWP type atomic operations while POCQ has pending operations

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F CMP_ADQ_FULL_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times ADQ is full for CMP type atomic operations while POCQ has pending operations

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F TXDAT_STALL_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times HN-F has a pending TXDAT flit but no credits to upload

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F TXRSP_STALL_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times HN-F has a pending TXRSP flit but no credits to upload

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SEQ_FULL_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times requests are replayed in SLC pipe due to SEQ being full

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SEQ_HIT_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times a request in SLC hit a pending SF eviction in SEQ

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SNP_SENT_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of snoops sent including directed, multicast, and SF back invalidation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SFBI_DIR_SNP_SENT_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times directed snoops were sent due to SF back invalidation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SFBI_BRD_SNP_SENT_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times multicast snoops were sent due to SF back invalidation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SNP_SENT_UNTRK_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times snooped were sent due to untracked RNF's

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F INTV_DIRTY_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times SF back invalidation resulted in dirty line intervention from the RN

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F STASH_SNP_SENT_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times stash snoops were sent

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F STASH_DATA_PULL_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times stash snoops resulted in data pull from the RN

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: HN-F SNP_FWDED_EVENT
event.description: Counts number of times data forward snoops were sent

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rrt_rd_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: RRT read occupancy count overflow.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rrt_wr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: RRT write occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rdt_rd_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: RDT read occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rdt_wr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: RDT write occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_wdb_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: WDB occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rrt_rd_alloc
event.description: RRT read allocation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rrt_wr_alloc
event.description: RRT write allocation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rdt_rd_alloc
event.description: RDT read allocation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_rdt_wr_alloc
event.description: RDT write allocation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_wdb_alloc
event.description: WDB allocation

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_txrsp_retryack
event.description: RETRYACK TXRSP flit sent

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_arvalid_no_arready
event.description: ARVALID set without ARREADY event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_arready_no_arvalid
event.description: ARREADY set without ARVALID event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_awvalid_no_awready
event.description: AWVALID set without AWREADY event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_awready_no_awvalid
event.description: AWREADY set without AWVALID event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_wvalid_no_wready
event.description: WVALID set without WREADY event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_txdat_stall
event.description: TXDAT stall (TXDAT valid but no link credit available)

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_nonpcie_serialization
event.description: Non-PCIe serialization event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: hni_pcie_serialization
event.description: PCIe serialization event

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: S0 RDataBeats
event.description: Number of RData beats, RVALID and RREADY, dispatched on port 0. This is a measure of the read bandwidth, including CMO responses.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: S1 RDataBeats
event.description: Number of RData beats, RVALID and RREADY, dispatched on port 1. This is a measure of the read bandwidth, including CMO responses.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: S2 RDataBeats
event.description: Number of RData beats, RVALID and RREADY, dispatched on port 2. This is a measure of the read bandwidth, including CMO responses.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: RXDAT Flits received
event.description: Number of RXDAT flits received. This is a measure of the true read data bandwidth, excluding CMOs.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: TXDAT Flits sent
event.description: Number of TXDAT flits dispatched. This is a measure of the write bandwidth.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: Total TXREQ Flits sent
event.description: Number of TXREQ flits dispatched. This is a measure of the total request bandwidth.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: Retried TXREQ Flits sent
event.description: Number of retried TXREQ flits dispatched. This is a measure of the retry rate.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: RRT full
event.description: All entries in the read request tracker are occupied. This is a measure of oversubscription in the read request tracker.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: WRT full
event.description: All entries in the write request tracker are occupied. This is a measure of oversubscription in the write request tracker.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: Replayed TXREQ Flits
event.description: Number of replayed TXREQ flits. This is the measure of replay rate.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_WRCANCEL_SENT
event.description: Number of write data cancels sent. This is the measure of write cancel rate

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_WDATABEAT_P0
event.description: Number of WData beats, WVALID and WREADY , dispatched on port 0. This is a measure of write bandwidth on AXI port 0.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_WDATABEAT_P1
event.description: Number of WData beats, WVALID and WREADY , dispatched on port 1. This is a measure of write bandwidth on AXI port 1.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_WDATABEAT_P2
event.description: Number of WData beats, WVALID and WREADY , dispatched on port 2. This is a measure of write bandwidth on AXI port 2.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_RRTALLOC
event.description: Number of allocations in the read request tracker. This is a measure of read transaction count

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_WRTALLOC
event.description: Number of allocations in the write request tracker. This is a measure of write transaction count

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_RDB_UNORD
event.description: Number of cycles for which Read Data Buffer state machine is in Unordered Mode.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_RDB_REPLAY
event.description: Number of cycles for which Read Data Buffer state machine is in Replay mode

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_RDB_HYBRID
event.description: Number of cycles for which Read Data Buffer state machine is in hybrid mode. Hybrid mode is where there ix of ordered/unordered traffic.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_RNI_RDB_ORD
event.description: Number of cycles for which Read Data Buffer state machine is in ordered Mode.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_RXREQ_DVMOP
event.description: Number of DVMOP requests received.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_RXREQ_DVMSYNC
event.description: Number of DVM Sync requests received.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_RXREQ_DVMOP_VMID_FILTERED
event.description: Number of incoming DVMOP requests that are subject to VMID based filtering.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_RXREQ_RETRIED
event.description: Number of incoming requests that are retried. This is a measure of the retry rate.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_TRK_OCCUPANCY_ALL
event.description: Counts all the tracker occupancy in DN.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_TRK_OCCUPANCY_DVMOP
event.description: Counts the DVM Ops tracker occupancy in DN.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: PMU_DN_TRK_OCCUPANCY_DVNSYNC
event.description: Counts the DVM Syncs tracker occupancy in DN.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_rd_req
event.description: Read request

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_wr_req
event.description: Write request

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_cmo_req
event.description: CMO request

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_txrsp_retryack
event.description: RETRYACK TXRSP flit sent

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_txdat_flitv
event.description: TXDAT flit seen

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_txrsp_flitv
event.description: TXRSP flit seen

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_rd_req_trkr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: Read request tracker occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_wr_req_trkr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: Write request tracker occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_cmo_req_trkr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: CMO request tracker occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_wdb_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: WDB occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_rd_axi_trkr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: Read AXI pending tracker occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_cmo_axi_trkr_occ_cnt_ovfl
event.description: CMO AXI pending tracker occupancy count overflow

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_arvalid_no_arready
event.description: ARVALID set without ARREADY

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_awvalid_no_awready
event.description: AWVALID set without AWREADY

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_wvalid_no_wready
event.description: WVALID set without WREADY

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_txdat_stall
event.description: TXDAT stall (TXDAT valid but no link credit available)

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: sbsx_txrsp_stall
event.description: TXRSP stall (TXRSP valid but no link credit available)

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_req_txflit_valid
event.description: [Port E, channel REQ] Number of flits transmitted on a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit transfer bandwidth from an XP.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_req_txflit_stall
event.description: [Port E, channel REQ] Number of cycles when a flit is stalled at an XP waiting for link credits at a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit traffic congestion on the mesh and at the flit download ports.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_req_partial_dat_flit
event.description: [Port E, channel REQ] Number of times when a partial DAT flit is uploaded on to the mesh from a RN-F_CHIA port.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_rsp_txflit_valid
event.description: [Port E, channel RSP] Number of flits transmitted on a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit transfer bandwidth from an XP.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_rsp_txflit_stall
event.description: [Port E, channel RSP] Number of cycles when a flit is stalled at an XP waiting for link credits at a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit traffic congestion on the mesh and at the flit download ports.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_rsp_partial_dat_flit
event.description: [Port E, channel RSP] Number of times when a partial DAT flit is uploaded on to the mesh from a RN-F_CHIA port.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_snp_txflit_valid
event.description: [Port E, channel SNP] Number of flits transmitted on a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit transfer bandwidth from an XP.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_snp_txflit_stall
event.description: [Port E, channel SNP] Number of cycles when a flit is stalled at an XP waiting for link credits at a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit traffic congestion on the mesh and at the flit download ports.

event.name: mxp_e_snp_partial_dat_flit
event.description: [Port E, channel SNP] Number of times when a partial DAT flit is uploaded on to the mesh from a RN-F_CHIA port.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_e_dat_txflit_valid
event.description: [Port E, channel DAT] Number of flits transmitted on a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit transfer bandwidth from an XP.

event.description: [Port E, channel DAT] Number of cycles when a flit is stalled at an XP waiting for link credits at a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit traffic congestion on the mesh and at the flit download ports.

event.description: [Port S, channel DAT] Number of times when a partial DAT flit is uploaded on to the mesh from a RN-F_CHIA port.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_p0_req_txflit_valid
event.description: [Port 0, channel REQ] Number of flits transmitted on a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit transfer bandwidth from an XP.

event.title: CMN-600
event.name: mxp_p0_req_txflit_stall
event.description: [Port 0, channel REQ] Number of cycles when a flit is stalled at an XP waiting for link credits at a specified port and CHI channel. This is a measure of the flit traffic congestion on the mesh and at the flit download ports.

event.name: mxp_p0_req_partial_dat_flit
event.description: [Port 0, channel REQ] Number of times when a partial DAT flit is uploaded on to the mesh from a RN-F_CHIA port.
